name: Avatar Flight of Passage
description: Soar on the back of a mountain banshee through Pandora's floating mountains and bioluminescent forests in this breathtaking 3D flight experience.

tips.content: Most popular attraction at Animal Kingdom. Purchase Individual Lightning Lane or arrive at park opening.
Motion simulator experience - those prone to motion sickness should use caution.

name: Na'vi River Journey
description: Navigate through a mystical bioluminescent rainforest aboard reed boats in search of the Na'vi Shaman of Songs.

tips.content: Stunning visual effects and animatronics. Perfect for all ages and Pandora fans.
Transfer device available to assist with wheelchair accessibility.

name: Kilimanjaro Safaris
description: Embark on an 18-minute African safari adventure to see live lions, elephants, giraffes, and other magnificent animals in their habitats.

tips.content: Animals are most active in early morning and late afternoon. Multiple rides recommended!
Each safari is different depending on animal activity. Bring a camera with zoom lens.

name: Festival of the Lion King
description: Experience the magic of Disney's The Lion King through this Broadway-style show featuring acrobatics, fire dancing, and beloved songs.

tips.content: One of Disney's best shows! Arrive 15 minutes early for better seating.
Theater-in-the-round format means every seat has a good view. Very popular with all ages.

name: Expedition Everest - Legend of the Forbidden Mountain
description: Race through the Himalayas on this thrilling roller coaster and come face-to-face with the legendary Yeti on Mount Everest.

tips.content: Features both forward and backward sections. The 80-foot drop is thrilling!
Single rider line available for shorter waits. Mountain views during climb are spectacular.

name: Kali River Rapids
description: Navigate churning rapids on this white-water adventure through an Asian rainforest while learning about environmental conservation.

tips.content: You WILL get soaked! Bring waterproof bags for phones and valuables.
Other guests can spray you with water cannons from the bridge - beware!

name: DINOSAUR
description: Travel back 65 million years to rescue an iguanodon from extinction while dodging meteors and carnivorous dinosaurs.

tips.content: Attraction closing in 2026 for Tropical Americas development. Experience it while you can!
Very dark and intense with realistic dinosaur encounters. Not recommended for young children.

name: Zootopia: Better Zoogether!
description: Join Judy Hopps and Nick Wilde on a 3D adventure through different biomes of Zootopia in this immersive film experience.
location: Discovery Island - Tree of Life Theater

tips.content: Brand new attraction opening November 7, 2025! Replaces It's Tough to be a Bug.
3D film with sensory effects. Great for all ages and Zootopia fans.

name: Finding Nemo: The Big Blue... and Beyond
description: Dive into the underwater world with Marlin, Dory, and Nemo in this spectacular musical featuring puppetry and beloved songs.
location: DinoLand U.S.A. - Theater in the Wild

tips.content: Longest show at Animal Kingdom with impressive puppetry and effects. Arrive early for good seats.
Great air-conditioned break during hot days. Perfect for Finding Nemo fans.

name: Feathered Friends in Flight
description: Watch magnificent live birds demonstrate their natural abilities in this educational and entertaining outdoor show.

tips.content: Live bird demonstrations with exotic species. Weather dependent - check show times.
Educational and entertaining for bird lovers and families. Outdoor covered theater.

name: Wildlife Express Train
description: Take a scenic 1.2-mile train journey to Rafiki's Planet Watch with behind-the-scenes views of animal care areas.

tips.content: Only way to reach Rafiki's Planet Watch. Great for families with young children.
Behind-the-scenes views during the journey. Round-trip transportation included.

name: Gorilla Falls Exploration Trail
description: Walk through lush habitats to observe gorillas, hippos, and other African animals in naturalistic environments.

tips.content: Self-paced walking trail. Animals are most active in cooler parts of the day.
Spectacular gorilla habitat viewing. Bring a camera and take your time.

name: Maharajah Jungle Trek
description: Explore Asian temple ruins while observing magnificent tigers, fruit bats, and exotic birds in their habitats.

tips.content: Amazing tiger viewing opportunities. Visit multiple times as animals move throughout habitats.
Don't miss the fruit bat exhibit - they fly all around you in an aviary setting.

name: Discovery Island Trails
description: Wander peaceful paths around the Tree of Life to see flamingos, kangaroos, lemurs, and other animals.

tips.content: Great way to see the intricate Tree of Life carvings up close. Over 300 animal carvings!
Peaceful walking experience with multiple animal viewing opportunities.

name: Adventurers Outpost
description: Meet Mickey Mouse and Minnie Mouse dressed in their safari exploration gear for photos and autographs.

tips.content: Only place to meet Mickey and Minnie at Animal Kingdom. They're in adorable safari outfits!
Air-conditioned meet & greet location. Great for families and character collectors.

name: Conservation Station
description: Get a behind-the-scenes look at Disney's animal care, veterinary operations, and conservation efforts.

tips.content: Educational experience about Disney's animal care. Often see veterinary procedures through windows.
Must take Wildlife Express Train to reach this area. Combine with other Planet Watch activities.

name: Affection Section
description: Pet and interact with friendly farm animals including goats, sheep, and other domesticated creatures.

tips.content: Perfect for young children who want to pet animals. Hand sanitizing stations available.
Only petting zoo experience at Walt Disney World. Great family photo opportunities.

name: Wilderness Explorers
description: Embark on an all-day interactive adventure earning merit badges through challenges and activities throughout the park.

tips.content: Free activity inspired by Russell from UP. Pick up your handbook at park entrance or Discovery Island.
Great way to explore the park with purpose. Perfect for families with children ages 7-14.

name: Tiffins
description: Signature dining restaurant featuring globally-inspired cuisine with dishes inspired by the adventures of Disney Imagineers and their travels.

tips.content: Disney's most upscale restaurant at Animal Kingdom. Award-winning cuisine with global influences.
Artwork throughout restaurant tells stories of Disney Imagineers' adventures. Perfect for special occasions.

name: Sanaa
description: African- and Indian-inspired cuisine with stunning views of giraffes, zebras, and other animals on the savanna at Animal Kingdom Lodge.

tips.content: Famous bread service with unique dipping sauces. Watch animals from your table!
Located at Animal Kingdom Lodge but accessible to all guests. Bring binoculars for animal viewing.

name: Boma - Flavors of Africa
description: African-inspired buffet featuring over 50 different dishes from across the continent in a vibrant marketplace setting.

tips.content: Extensive African-inspired buffet with unique flavors. Great way to try new cuisines.
Breakfast and dinner service available. Popular with both adventurous eaters and families.

name: Tusker House Restaurant
description: Character dining buffet featuring Donald Duck and friends in safari outfits with African-inspired cuisine and American favorites.

tips.content: Only character dining in Animal Kingdom. Donald Duck, Mickey, Goofy, and Daisy in safari gear.
Buffet service with African-inspired dishes and kid-friendly options. Popular breakfast spot.

name: Yak & Yeti Restaurant
description: Pan-Asian cuisine featuring dishes from across Asia in a Nepalese-themed restaurant with intricate decor and artifacts.

tips.content: Pan-Asian menu with dishes from Thailand, China, Japan, and more. Beautiful themed interior.
Operated by Landry's Restaurants. Often easier to get reservations than Disney-operated restaurants.

name: Rainforest Cafe
description: Themed restaurant simulating a rainforest environment with animatronic animals, thunderstorms, and jungle sounds.

tips.content: Immersive rainforest theming with animatronic animals and periodic thunderstorms.
Can be loud and overwhelming for some guests. Great for kids who love animals and adventure.

name: Satu'li Canteen
description: Pandora-themed quick service restaurant offering customizable bowls with unique Na'vi-inspired flavors and ingredients.

tips.content: Build-your-own bowls with unique Pandoran ingredients. Very popular, use mobile order.
Themed to Pandora with bioluminescent decor. Healthy and flavorful options available.
